title: A Summer in Skye
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: The abigail then exclaimed, " Bless me, what long strides the jade takes, and how awkwardly she manages her clothes!" Miss Macdonald, wishing to put an end to this conversation, urged the party to a trot. The pedestrians then struck across the hills, and reached Kingsburgh House about eleven o'clock, — the equestrians arriving soon after.
